value: Write a program to take 1 input and check whether given input exists in our object or not, if it exists print exists or else prints not exist.
if input is “name” then output will be “exist”
If input is “class” then output will be “not exists”.

title: solution
value:
var readline = require('readline-sync');
let n =readline.question('Enter the property name:');
let dict={"name":"Raju", "marks":56}
for (i in dict){
if (i==n){
console.log("exists");
break
}else{
console.log("not exist");
break
}
}
